pyliburo.templaterulepalette module¶

class pyliburo.templaterulepalette.BaseTemplateRule¶

Bases: object

Attributes

Methods

for_shape_type¶

the shapetype the rule apply to: there are 6 shapetype, vertex, edge, face, shell, solid, compsolid, compound

get_analysis_rule_obj_dict_list()¶
add_analysis_rule(analysis_rule_obj, bool_condition)¶

add analysis rule to this template rule and specify its bool condition for the analysis rule (either true or false)

identify(occshape_attribs_obj_list, pycitygml_writer)¶

the analysis rule is defined and the method executes the analysis rule
